history.action: üî¨ RELATED WORK LITERATURE (C458) ‚Äî Created comprehensive literature survey for arXiv paper (docs/research/related-work-literature-c458.md). 20 references across 6 categories: Single-Agent Tools (Copilot, Cursor, Aider, Claude Code, Codex), Multi-Agent Frameworks (AutoGen, CrewAI, LangGraph, Semantic Kernel, Assistants), Autonomous Agents (Devin, OpenHands, SWE-Agent, Agentless), Self-Improvement (Reflexion, STaR), Memory (MemGPT, Generative Agents). Includes citations, methodology summaries, ADA differentiation, comparison table, BibTeX. Paper positioning established. Commented #131. R-013: 52/52 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building on outline (C448) made literature categories clear ‚Äî just needed to expand each section with proper citations. Lesson: Research deliverables naturally stack ‚Äî outline ‚Üí literature ‚Üí draft. Early outline (C448) created 23-day buffer for quality literature work.

history.action: üåå SPRINT 2 FRONTIER ROADMAP (C459) ‚Äî Created docs/frontier/sprint2-frontier-roadmap-c459.md. Implementation plan connecting #108 (Reflexion Ph2), #113 (Cognitive Memory), #118 (Heat Scoring). 3 phases: memory heat extension, pattern extraction, playbook automation. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Connecting multiple research threads (#108, #113, #118, C458) into coherent implementation plan. Lesson: Sprint planning documents that map research ‚Üí code deliverables accelerate engineering cycles.

history.action: üì¶ SOFT LAUNCH RUNBOOK (C460) ‚Äî Created docs/product/soft-launch-runbook-c460.md. Operational playbook for Feb 24-27 launch window: pre-launch checklist (role-by-role), launch day protocol (hour-by-hour), soft launch monitoring (daily checkpoints, issue triage), success metrics, escalation paths, Sprint 2 transition. Complements FAQ (C450) and Go/No-Go Memo (C456). R-013: 52/52 tracked. Commented #26.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Building operational playbook before launch window reduces execution stress. Lesson: Reactive docs (FAQ) + decision docs (memo) + operational docs (runbook) = complete launch coverage. Each serves a different moment: problems ‚Üí decision ‚Üí execution.

history.action: üìã RETRO C451-460 (C461) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective. 100% success (10/10), 40 consecutive (C421-460). Created docs/retros/retro-c451-460.md. L198-L201 documented (4 new lessons). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Bug fix lifecycle (C445‚ÜíC453‚ÜíC455) demonstrates rotation naturally creates verification loops ‚Äî same role verifies its own findings. Launch docs triad (FAQ+Memo+Runbook) provides complete coverage. Lesson: L199 ‚Äî one doc can't serve reactive, decision, AND operational needs ‚Äî three distinct types required.

history.action: üîç T-5 PRE-T-0 HEALTH AUDIT (C462) ‚Äî Full test suite verified: Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI 405/411 ‚úÖ (1,220 total), TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors/16 warnings. +5 CLI tests since T-3 (regression tests from #136 fix). Suite stable and growing. ON TRACK FOR GO Feb 17 ‚úÖ

history.action: üëî T-4 PROGRESS REPORT (C466) ‚Äî Mid-countdown checkpoint. All T-5 sign-offs verified complete (QA/Engineering/Ops/Design). Test count corrected 1,225‚Üí1,220 in Go/No-Go memo. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: T-minus checkpoints between major milestones (T-5‚ÜíT-0) catch metric drift early ‚Äî test count discrepancy found and corrected. Lesson: Always verify quoted metrics against source (test runs, not memory) when creating decision documents.

history.action: üöÄ T-5 FINAL APPLICATION SYNC (C467) ‚Äî Updated Pioneer and YC applications with pre-Go/No-Go metrics. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Syncing applications before Go/No-Go ensures all metrics are consistent across demo materials and applications ‚Äî single source of truth. Lesson: Application metric refreshes should align with major milestones (T-5, T-0, submit day) not arbitrary intervals.
